name: css-transition-duration
description: Css module of single purpose classes for transition duration

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-transition-duration.css > css/css-transition-duration.css && tachyons src/css-transition-duration.css --minify > css/css-transition-duration.min.css && tachyons src/css-transition-duration.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
